TJCViewDelegate Protocol Reference

Conforms to NSObject
Declared in Tapjoy.h

Overview

The Tapjoy View Delegate Protocol.

Tasks

  • – viewWillAppearWithType:

    Called when a Tapjoy view will appear.
  • – viewDidAppearWithType:

    Called when a Tapjoy view did appear.
  • – viewWillDisappearWithType:

    Called when a Tapjoy view will disappear.
  • – viewDidDisappearWithType:

    Called when a Tapjoy view did disappear.

Instance Methods

viewDidAppearWithType:

Called when a Tapjoy view did appear.

- (void)viewDidAppearWithType:(int)viewType

Parameters

viewType

The type of view that did appear. Refer to TJCViewTypeEnum for view types.

Return Value

n/a

Discussion

Called when a Tapjoy view did appear.

Tapjoy.h
